english.segment1: Don't know what he sees in me. He is spirit, he is free. And I, the wife of adultery. Gomer is my name. Simply more than I can see. How he keeps on forgiving me;. How he keeps his sanity. Hosea, you're a fool.
english.segment2: Chorus: A fool to love someone like me, A fool to suffer silently;. Though sometimes through your eyes I see. I'd rather be a fool.
english.segment3: The fondness of a father, The passion of a child;. The tenderness of a loving friend. An understanding smile. All of this and so much more, You've lavished on a faithless whore. I've never known love like this before. Hosea, you're a fool.
english.segment4: Chorus: A fool to love someone like me, A fool to suffer silently;. Though sometimes through your eyes I see. I'd rather be a fool.
english.segment5: Bridge: This God of yours would not have told. To lift a love that you couldn't hold;. And though time and time again I flee, I'm always glad to see you coming after me!
english.segment6: Simply more than I can see, How he keeps on forgiving me. The wife of adultery;. Gomer is my name.
